framework.api

Interface IModel

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISerializable<java.lang.String>, ISignalListener, IXMLCodec
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseModel, ProjectModel, PropertiesModel, TileLayerModel, TileMapModel, TileModel

    public interface IModel
extends ISignalListener, IXMLCodec
    This interface describes the general contract rules of all model type implementors
    Author:
    Daniel Ricci <thedanny09@icloud.com>
